channel.title: Cant run any client or source on Windows 7 ! Java errors -.-
channel.description:
hi . im new here.. and i need some help whit client and source !!! ____ Problem is that: everytime i run client (run.bat) file. comes error... i have tryed so many ways.. always errors.. error line:
[sup]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/sup]
Source (server.bat) error line:
[sup]The system cannot find the file bin\server\Gui.exe. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/sup]
____
And also i use "CreativeScape aka Shard" Source...
____
Please ppl !! I need help !! if i can log in server and we get it work.. I will give reward in runescape: 10M rsgp !
MY MSN : bad.evildevil@hotmail.com !! I wait for help !!! :(

item.title: Cant run any client or source on Windows 7 ! Java errors -.-
item.dc:creator: @jasonhelpme123 jasonhelpme123
item.description:
@jasonhelpme123 wrote:

i used to have this problem but i say download jdk the newest release which is 23 or it might be 24 now idk but after that dl jre6 then goto run.bat on source-side and client-side and if it has a lower number with the jdk like jdk1.6.0_17 change the _(number) to your current java like 23 so it will look like “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 i hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Cant run any client or source on Windows 7 ! Java errors -.-

item.title: Cant run any client or source on Windows 7 ! Java errors -.-
item.dc:creator: @RelaxN RelaxN
item.description:
@RelaxN wrote:

hi . im new here… and i need some help whit client and source !!!

Problem is that:
everytime i run client (run.bat) file. comes error… i have tryed so many ways… always errors…
error line:

[sup]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .[/sup]

Source (server.bat) error line:

[sup]The system cannot find the file bin\server\Gui.exe.
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .[/sup]

And also i use “CreativeScape aka Shard” Source…

Please ppl !! I need help !!
if i can log in server and we get it work…
I will give reward in runescape: 10M rsgp !

MY MSN : bad.evildevil@hotmail.com !!
I wait for help !!!
